<meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html; charset=utf-8\"/>
<style type="text/css">
table {
 border-collapse: collapse;
 border: 1px #fd8900 solid;
}
th {
 background-color: #fff300;
 color: #fd8900;
 border: 1px #fd8900 solid;
}
th table , th table tr td{
 border: 0px #000 solid;
 white-space: pre-wrap;
 font-weight: bold;
}
a:link, a:visited {
 color: #fd8900;
}
a:hover, a:active {
 color: #886600;
}
td.sort_column, td.sort_column a:link, td.sort_column a:visited {
 color: #553300;
 display:inline;
}
td.filtered_column_label {
 font-style: italic;
}
td.filter_icon, td.filter_icon a:link, td.filter_icon a:visited {
 color: #fd8900;
 display:inline;
 text-decoration:none;
 font-size: 1.7em;
 padding-left: 7px;
 padding-right: 7px;
}
td {
 white-space: pre;
 border-right: 1px #fd8900 solid;
 padding-left: 5px;
 padding-right: 5px;
}
tr.even td {
 background-color:#ffffe1;
}
tr.odd td {
 background-color:#fff;
}
td.pass { 
 color:#0A0; 
 font-weight:bold;
}
td.fail { 
 color:#F00; 
 font-weight:bold;
}
td.slow {
 color:#FA0;
 font-weight:bold;
}
</style>
